name: Config: Version Check
info:
### Description
Check Wandschalter Config Version on Shelly

---

### Input (msg.payload)
 - scriptName
 - scriptVersion
 - scriptVersionName
 - shellyPath

---

### Return (msg.payload)
 - true (config is up to date)
 - false (new config has to be set)

name: Handle Webhooks
info:
### Description
Delete all Webhooks with wandschalter_ and create it again

---

### Input (msg.payload)
 - shellyPath
 - shellyID
 - cid
 - webAppURL

---

### Return (msg.payload)
 - empty

name: Configuration for Shellies
info:
### Description
 * Channel settings
    * input mode Switch
    * Set relay type: Detached
    * Set Relay power on default: on
    * Consumption type: Lights
 * Webhooks:
    * as sortes to push
 * Networks:
    * Access point Disabel
    * Cloud Enable
    * Bluetooth Enable
    * MQTT Enable and set all values
 * script
    * Script Version





---

 * Check Version  
    --> if new Version
    * Check Webhooks

name: refersh MiHome Cons (SubFn)
func: return (msg.consumers.includes('mihome') && msg.payload === 'mihome') ? {...msg, payload:{}} : undefined;

name: refersh Sonoff FilteredSwitch (SubFn)
func: return (msg.switches.includes('sonoff') && msg.payload === 'sonoff') ? {...msg, payload:{}} : undefined;
